mapper.select: SELECT mac.factory ,mac.worksShop ,mac.productionLine ,mac.cncSystem FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) WHERE mac.useStatus = 1 GROUP BY mac.factory ,mac.worksShop ,mac.productionLine ,mac.cncSystem

SELECT TOP 10 ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by macPSH.macWorkTime DESC) rank ,mac.machineName ,(macPSH.macWorkTime/60)macWorkTime ,macPSH.macProdNum FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) LEFT JOIN( SELECT macSH.machineCode , SUM(datediff(SECOND,macSH.startTime,macSH.endTime)) macWorkTime ,COUNT(1) macProdNum from machinestatushistory macSH with(nolock) WHERE macSH.status = 1 AND macSH.startTime IS NOT NULL AND macSH.endTime IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(varchar(100),macSH.startTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY,-8, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY ,-1, GETDATE()), 23) GROUP BY macSH.machineCode ) macPSH ON mac.machineCode = macPSH.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macPSH.macWorkTime DESC

SELECT TOP 6 mac.machineName ,convert(varchar(100), macPArm.alarmMsg) alarmMsg ,macPArm.knifeNum ,macPArm.occurrenceTime FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) INNER JOIN( select macArm.machineCode ,macArm.alarmMsg ,macArm.knifeNum ,MIN(macArm.occurrenceTime) occurrenceTime FROM machinealarmhistory macArm with(nolock) LEFT JOIN machinestatus macSta with(nolock) ON macSta.machineCode = macArm.machineCode WHERE ASCII(macArm.alarmMsg) > 0 AND macSta.status = 3 AND macSta.updateTime > DATEADD(MINUTE, -30, GETDATE()) AND macArm.occurrenceTime BETWEEN DATEADD(MINUTE, -15, GETDATE()) AND GETDATE() GROUP BY macArm.machineCode ,macArm.alarmMsg ,macArm.knifeNum ) macPArm ON mac.machineCode = macPArm.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macPArm.occurrenceTime DESC

SELECT TOP 10 mac.machineName ,macKni.knifePosition ,macKni.totalCount ,macKni.currentCount ,macKni.surplusCount FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) INNER JOIN( SELECT kni.machineCode ,kni.knifePosition ,(CASE WHEN kni.totalCount IS NULL THEN 3000 WHEN 1 > kni.totalCount THEN 3000 ELSE kni.totalCount END) totalCount ,(CASE WHEN kniL.currentCount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE kniL.currentCount END) currentCount ,((CASE WHEN kni.totalCount IS NULL THEN 3000 WHEN 1 > kni.totalCount THEN 3000 ELSE kni.totalCount END) - (CASE WHEN kniL.currentCount is NULL THEN 0 ELSE kniL.currentCount END))surplusCount FROM knifeinfo kni with(nolock) LEFT JOIN knifelife kniL ON kniL.machineCode = kni.machineCode AND kniL.knifeNum = kni.knifePosition WHERE kni.status = 1 ) macKni ON mac.machineCode = macKni.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macKni.surplusCount

SELECT mac.productionLine ,bkd.knifeDiameter ,COUNT (1) brokenNum FROM dbo.brokenknifedetail bkd with(nolock) JOIN machineinfo mac with(nolock) on mac.machineCode = bkd.machineCode WHERE CONVERT(varchar(100),bkd.brokenTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY,-8, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY ,-1, GETDATE()), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 GROUP BY mac.productionLine ,bkd.knifeDiameter ORDER BY bkd.knifeDiameter

SELECT mac.productionLine ,bkd.knifeNum ,COUNT (1) brokenNum FROM dbo.brokenknifedetail bkd with(nolock) JOIN machineinfo mac with(nolock) on mac.machineCode = bkd.machineCode WHERE CONVERT(varchar(100),bkd.brokenTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY,-8, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY ,-1, GETDATE()), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 GROUP BY mac.productionLine ,bkd.knifeNum ORDER BY bkd.knifeNum;

SELECT COUNT(1) prodLineProdNum from machinestatushistory macSH with(nolock) LEFT JOIN machineinfo mac ON mac.machineCode = macSH.machineCode WHERE macSH.status = 1 AND macSH.startTime IS NOT NULL AND macSH.endTime IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(varchar(100),macSH.startTime,23) = CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 GROUP BY mac.productionLine
